mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.chongwu_order_uuid_number as chongwuOrderUuidNumber ,a.chongwu_id as chongwuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.chongwu_order_name as chongwuOrderName ,a.chongwu_order_phone as chongwuOrderPhone ,a.chongwu_order_id_number as chongwuOrderIdNumber ,a.chongwu_order_photo as chongwuOrderPhoto ,a.chongwu_order_zheng_photo as chongwuOrderZhengPhoto ,a.chongwu_order_fan_photo as chongwuOrderFanPhoto ,a.chongwu_order_xinyong_photo as chongwuOrderXinyongPhoto ,a.chongwu_order_types as chongwuOrderTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
